definition: abbr. for Ukraine 烏克蘭|乌克兰[Wu1 ke4 lan2]/surname Wu

sentences.english: Shortly after this slip, Escobar was shot and killed in what many people view as a related incident.
sentences.chinese: 很多人都認爲他的死與這個烏龍球有關。

sentences.english: There has never been an own goal in the World Cup Final.
sentences.chinese: 世界盃決賽還從來沒有出現過烏龍球。

sentences.english: You can't blame the referee for the own-goal at the end but the time?
sentences.chinese: 最後時刻的烏龍球你不能怪裁判，但是時間呢？

sentences.english: It is very unusual for three own goals to be scored in one match at international level.
sentences.chinese: 烏龍球“帽子戲法”在國際水平的賽事中極爲罕見。

sentences.english: Forlan hit a brace for the visitors and Gilberto Siva netted an own goal.
sentences.chinese: 福蘭爲客隊進球，吉爾貝託席爾瓦打進烏龍球。

sentences.english: That's probably why he holds the record for the most own goals against us.
sentences.chinese: 也許這正是他保持着我們烏龍球紀錄的原因。

sentences.english: England won Paraguay 1 - 0 , for No 4's own goal of Paraguay.
sentences.chinese: 英格蘭因爲巴拉圭4號的烏龍球，最後以1比0獲勝。
